tournament.name: Blue - Anyone in the world can participate !

decks.notes: The main theme of this deck is to utilize a combo strategy with reanimating powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes various cards that support this strategy such as Bloodtithe Harvester, Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, and The Cruelty of Gix. It also includes removal spells like Abrade, Cut Down, and Go for the Throat to control the board. Additionally, cards like Atsushi, the Blazing Sky and Brotherhood's End provide additional synergy to the combo strategy. With a mix of reanimation, removal, and synergy cards, this deck aims to dominate the game through powerful combo plays.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing a mixture of powerful creatures and disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. By combining aggressive threats like Adeline, Resplendent Cathar and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben with removal spells like Go for the Throat, the deck aims to pressure opponents and disrupt their game plan. The inclusion of cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Ertai Resurrected provides additional value and ways to close out the game. With a strong mana base and a focused game plan, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.
